    • manageWarehouse

      public boolean manageWarehouse​(Resource[] resources)
      define if the array in input respect the warehouse rules
      Parameters:
      resources - is the resource to store
      Returns:
      true if the array respect the rules, false otherwise

    • changeDepot

      public boolean changeDepot​(int depot1, int depot2)
      allows the management of the warehouse by changing the position of the resources in the depots if possible
      Parameters:
      depot1 - is the first depot to control
      depot2 - is the second depot to control
      Returns:
      true after changing the position of the resources, false if you can't change the position

    • addResources

      public void addResources​(Resource[] resources) throws IllegalInputException
      Description copied from interface: Store
      add the resources contained into the param to the target depot
      Specified by:
      addResources in interface Store
      Parameters:
      resources - contains the resources to be added
      Throws:
      IllegalInputException - if client input isn't correct

    • giveResources

      public Resource[] giveResources​(Resource[] resources, boolean remove)
      Description copied from interface: Store
      determines if the depot contains the resources in the param, if it does and remove is true, those resources get removed from the depot; if it does and remove is false, those resources are only peeked. If the resources aren't in the store, returns the remaining resources from the input. If all resources are present in the store, returns null.
      Specified by:
      giveResources in interface Store
      Parameters:
      resources - contains the resources to be removed
      remove - if true remove the resources passed in the array, if false doesn't change the store
      Returns:
      a Resource or a Resource array that contains the required resources which aren't in the store

    • peekAllResources

      public Resource[] peekAllResources()
      Description copied from interface: Store
      returns all the resources contained in the depot
      Specified by:
      peekAllResources in interface Store
      Returns:
      a Resource or a Resource array with type and quantity of each resource

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
